name: Infinite Hotel (agentsmith200)
description:
A game submitted just in time for RadRize's GameJam 2022 $25

In honor of Hilbert's Infinite Hotel Paradox, I present the Infinite Hotel.

Every 90 seconds more guests will arrive. You will have to build additional floors to accommodate them all. Every floor adds 50 rooms.

Blocks that can be used to assemble the floors are generated 3 at a time randomly. Click on the blocks and click where on the blueprint you want them to go. Press R to rotate the blocks if needed.

If you need other blocks to fit in the blueprint, use the Replace Blocks button. The Replace Blocks button costs $25 to use. You gain money every second based on the number of floors your hotel has.

You lose when you can't accommodate the new number of guests.

To discard a held block just click anywhere except on the blueprint.
